channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: OpenAI and AWS team up in potentially one of the biggest tech partnerships ever seen - so what will it mean for you?
item.description: OpenAI’s $38 billion partnership with AWS will expand massive AI workloads, deepening cloud hosting dependence and raising sustainability concerns.

item.title: Spirit and Art the Clown Are Refusing to Let Halloween Go
item.description: Spooky season might be over, but the retailer wants to keep its meme-y reputation enduring with new holiday offerings.

item.title: Uber Wants To Be an AI Company Too
item.description: Uber CEO wants physics PhDs using the app for AI gigs.

item.title: A Popular Gourmet Mushroom Is Escaping Gardens and Invading US Forests
item.description: “It is slowly marching south, which is really terrifying.”

item.title: Rivian creates another spinoff company called Mind Robotics
item.description: It's the second time this year Rivian has spun out a new company, after it created micromobility startup Also in March.

item.title: I let Gemini watch my family for the weekend — it got weird
item.description: This weekend, I turned my home into a test lab for Google's new Gemini for Home AI and subjected my family to 72 hours of surveillance as it watched, interpreted, and narrated our every move. My purpose? To find out if an AI that sees everything is actually helpful or just plain creepy. "R unpacking […]

item.title: Influencers have fractured reality in Portland
item.description: The legal fight over whether the president can send troops into Portland, Oregon, depends on whether judges believe their own eyes or their smartphones. Even before inception, the lawsuit has been dogged by a war on reality fueled by social media influencers, some of whom have direct lines to federal officials. At every turn, influencers […]

item.title: Apple désactive une fonction iPhone/Watch en Europe : le DMA pousse trop loin, Apple casse tout
item.description: Apple désactive une fonction plutôt que de se conformer au DMA.

item.title: Small Towns Are Betting That the Data Center Boom Will Never End
item.description: What do data centers bring? Short-term growth, and long-term questions.

item.title: The best deals on MacBooks right now
item.description: Apple currently sells MacBooks equipped with its own M-series processors in a wide range of sizes and price points, all of which run the company’s new operating system, macOS 26. The latest 14-inch MacBook Pro that debuted in October 2025 features the M5 processor, its fastest and most efficient yet, and it’s already over $50 […]

item.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new agentic capabilities to help book event tickets and beauty appointments
item.description: For example, you can ask "find me 2 cheap tickets for the Shaboozey concert coming up. prefer standing floor tickets." AI Mode will then search across multiple websites to find real-time ticket options that meet your specific requests.

item.title: The Arduboy credit card-sized Game Boy now supports multiplayer over USB
item.description: After debuting a matchbox-sized handheld called the Arduboy Mini and a banana-shaped version of the original Arduboy, creator Kevin Bates has announced a new model of Arduboy FX called the FX-C with some welcome upgrades and new color options. For the first time, the credit card-sized Arduboy now has a USB-C port for charging, syncing, […]

item.title: Sequoia names Alfred Lin and Pat Grady as new Co-Stewards as Roelof Botha steps down
item.description: Just over three years after taking the reins as the steward of the storied firm, Botha passed the leadership baton to Lin and Grady.

item.title: ‘The Mummy’ Is Returning With Original Stars Brendan Fraser and Rachel Weisz
item.description: Stars of the beloved 1999 reboot and its sequel are returning to the Universal Monster franchise.

item.title: Nvidia is building an "AI Megafactory" for Samsung with 50,000 GPUs - could this be the start of a new AI dawn?
item.description: Samsung’s AI Megafactory aims to unify semiconductor, robotics, and digital twin systems, all powered by Nvidia GPUs.

item.title: Un phénomène rare observé en direct : des anneaux sont en train de naître autour d’un astre du Système solaire !
item.description: Galilée a le premier observé les anneaux de Saturne avec sa lunette, mais sans comprendre vraiment leur nature. Depuis, on en a trouvé autour de bien des corps célestes du Système solaire. Il semblerait que certains sont en cours de formation. Ce qui est sûr, c'est que même des astronomes...

item.title: The Most-Hated MacBook Could Return Without the Same Compromises
item.description: Apple is reportedly working on a do-over.

item.title: The "class-leading" DJI Osmo Pocket 3 just got a massive $200 discount at Best Buy
item.description: The DJI Osmo Pocket 3 just got a huge saving of $200 in Best Buy’s early Black Friday deals.

item.title: 12 Classic Cartoons to Stream for Free, and Where to Find Them
item.description: 'Looney Tunes,' 'My Little Pony,' 'Transformers,' 'Strawberry Shortcake,' and more are available to watch without a paid subscription.

item.title: The 55 Best Shows on Disney+ Right Now (November 2025)
item.description: Fire And Water: Making The Avatar Films, Marvel Zombies, and Doctor Who are just a few of the shows you should be watching on Disney+ this month.

item.title: Deck your house in Govee’s smart string lights, which are cheaper ahead of the holidays
item.description: Now that spooky season’s over, it’s time to swap the pumpkins and skeletons for something a little more cheery ahead of the holidays. Govee’s Christmas Lights 2 are customizable string lights that will add some smart home magic to your tree, with plenty of slack left over to adorn your space. Right now, they’re discounted […]

item.title: Legendary CD-ROM maker has best value SSD pre-Black Friday: RiDATA 2TB Gen4 SSD costs only $106 and, surprise, surprise, has SLC cache
item.description: This $105.99 RiDATA A801 2TB NVMe SSD is one of the best sub-$110 Gen 4 drives available, delivering speeds up to 5000 MB/s and outperforming many pricier models.

item.title: Walmart's official Black Friday sale starts next week – here's how to get early access
item.description: Walmart's 2025 Black Friday sale kicks off next week - here's how to get early access, plus preview the official Walmart Black Friday Ad with the top deals I'd buy.

item.title: Sora is now available on Android in the US, Canada, and other regions
item.description: The Android version of Sora retains all the features of its iOS counterpart, including the “Cameos” feature, which allows users to generate videos of themselves performing various activities using their own likeness.

item.title: Teachers Get Death Threats After MAGA Claims Their Halloween Costumes Mocked Charlie Kirk
item.description: A Turning Point USA official inaccurately claimed a high school's math department wore Halloween costumes that mocked Charlie Kirk. Those teachers are now facing a flood of online attacks and death threats.
